sinks.name: DimensionTableSink
sinks.description: Complete the enrich (Gold layer) with SCD details.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PrimaryKey as string,
	Columns as string,
	vSinkFile as string,
	vContainerName as string,
	vPath as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedInput
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: ($vContainerName),
	folderPath: (concat($vPath,$vSinkFile)),
	mode: 'read') ~> ExistingDimensionTable
AddHashInput, AddHashExisting exists(AddHashInput@id_hash == AddHashExisting@id_hash
	&& AddHashInput@columns_hash == AddHashExisting@columns_hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewAndUpdatedRows
CuratedInput derive(id_hash = md5(byName($PrimaryKey)),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashInput
FilterForActive derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($PrimaryKey,','))),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashExisting
AddHashExisting aggregate(MaxSurrogateKey = iifNull(max(toInteger(byName('SURKEY'))),0)) ~> GetMaxSurrogateKey
NewAndUpdatedRows keyGenerate(output(SURKEY as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> AddKey
AddKey, GetMaxSurrogateKey join(SURKEY == MaxSurrogateKey || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey
JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey derive(SURKEY = SURKEY + iifNull(MaxSurrogateKey,0),
		SCDACTIVE = 1,
		SCDACTIVESTARTTIME = toString(currentTimestamp(), 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'),
		SCDACTIVEENDTIME = toString(toTimestamp(toString(null())))) ~> AddDimensionColumns
AddHashExisting, NewAndUpdatedRows exists(AddHashExisting@id_hash == AddHashInput@id_hash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterForUpdatedValues
FilterForUpdatedValues derive(SCDACTIVE = 0,
		SCDACTIVEENDTIME = toString(currentTimestamp(), 'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) ~> UpdateObsolete
AddDimensionColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColsInput
MarkAsInsert, DropUnwantedColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionAllData
UpdateObsolete alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkAsUpdate
ModifyColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColumns
DropUnwantedColsInput alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkAsInsert
ExistingDimensionTable filter(toInteger(byName('SCDACTIVE')) == 1) ~> FilterForActive
MarkAsUpdate derive(each(match(name=='SURKEY'), $$ = toInteger($$))) ~> ModifyColumns1
UnionAllData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: ($vContainerName),
	folderPath: (concat($vPath,$vSinkFile)),
	overwrite: true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: true,
	updateable: true,
	upsertable: false,
	keys:[($PrimaryKey)],
	partitionFileNames:[($vSinkFile)],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimensionTableSink
